pkgmetadata.longdescription: Semiparametric Competing Risks Regression under Left Truncation and Interval Censoring with Missing Cause of Failure // Semiparametric regression models on the cumulative incidence function for interval-censored competing risks data as described in Bakoyannis, Yu, Yiannoutsos (2017) doi:10.1002/sim.7350, left-truncated and interval-censored competing risks data, and interval-censored compering risks data and missing cause of failure. We provide the proportional subdistribution hazards model (Fine-Gray model), the proportional odds model, and other models that belong to the class of semiparametric generalized odds rate transformation models.
